Package com.navis.framework.portal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApiMappingLoader  
    BizPortalFacade  
    BizResponseXmlTags
    Declares the XML tags used in the XML representation of the BizResponse Object.
    CrudBizDelegate
    Defines a standard CRUD interface to the backend.
    CrudBizDelegateLegacy Deprecated
    all methods replaced by RequestContext or MetafieldId overloaded method signatures
    IGadgetDataSource
    This interface defines a source of statistics data, exposing a method to obtain a statistic.
    IMultiThreadBatchedDomainQueryExecutor
    This interface allows to execute a domain query in multithread mode with batching.
    IRecapBizFacade
    Portal biz facade behind the Recap view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiMapping
    Spring-configured bean to hold an API mapping.
    ApiMappingLoaderImpl  
    ApiMappings
    Encapsulates mapping of API name to details about the API.
    AttributeUtils
    This class contains utility methods for attributes.
    BizMessage
    A Javabean encapsulating a message generated by the Business tier
    BizPortalBizDelegate
    Provides a business delegate that talks to the BizPortalClient.
    BizPortalClient
    Central request/response processing portal.
    BizPortalPea
    Pea version of BaseSessionBean.
    BizPortalPrefs
    Currently requiresUserContext only controls whether an error stack will be produced if a user context is not provided.
    BizRequest
    Encapsulates a generalized request of the Business tier from the Presentation tier.
    BizRequestHandlerBase
    Since we do not have multiple inheritance, holds code shared by BizPortalPea and nothing
    BizResponse
    Encapsulates a response formed by the Business Tier in response to a request from the Presentation Tier.
    CrudDelegate
    Static access to the business tier for DB-related queries.
    CrudOperation
    Defines a single CRUD operation
    CrudOperationBean
    Defines a single CRUD operation (javabean version for webservices)
    CrudResult
    Encapsultes the results of a CRUD operation.
    DataSourceDatabaseType
    This class identifies database type name based on the driver name.
    DefaultUserContextProvider
    Do not use directly.
    FieldChange
    Defines a requested change to one field
    FieldChanges
    Encapsulates a collection of FieldChange objects, a set of changes to be applied to the fields of an Entity.
    Gullectors
    Google Collections enhancement to Collector
    JndiUtil
    N4 wrapper for JNDI Lookups
    KeyValuePair
    Defines a metafield ID and value pair
    MultiThreadBatchedDomainQueryExecutor
    This class is an implementation of IMultiThreadBatchedDomainQueryExecutor.
    Ordering
    Associates a field with and ordering (ascending or descending).
    PortalBeanUtils
    Convinience methods for fetching framework beans out of the portal context
    PortalConsts
    Declaration of String constants used by the framework 'portal' package.
    QuartzClusterUtil
    Utility class that helps determine the node in the quartz cluster to execute the job on.
    QuartzDriverDelegateClassFactory
    This class returns quartz delegete class to serve specific database.
    QueryBounds Deprecated
    use Bounded interface of ExecutableQuery and QueryResult
    QueryResultCallable
    This class is callable from MultiThreadBatchedDomainQueryExecutor
    QueryUtils
    This class contains utility methods for domain queries manipulations
    RecapBizFacade
    Implementation for IRecapBizFacade
    SessionCounter
    This class serves as session counter.
    Tuple<A extends java.io.Serializable,B extends java.io.Serializable>
    An immutable, serializable 2-tuple class.
    UserContext
    Encapsulates the identity of the user making a BizRequest.
